title: Challenging the OSCP, getting free exam (retake) & cracking it the smart way
snippet: TLDR; How one can better prepare for the updated OSCP exam. The mistakes done and lessons learned in my OSCP journey that I could not find in other blogs and getting a free exam retake. The (MX) is to highlight the mistakes I did.Background: I had 4 years of pentest and red teaming experience at ...
